lines.text: Bert, an average mouse eats 12 pounds of cheese in a lifetime. I figure tonight we've lived 2000 years.
Hubie, I'll never be able to touch this stuff again.
Me neither. So there's nothing left to live for.
You mean...?
[Hubie nods]
Come on, Bert. Let's get it over with.
Yeah, yeah. Over.

[the dog is at an adding machine]
Let's see now. Mice don't like cheese...
[types on machine, pulls lever]
...and mice want cat to eat them.
[types on machine, pulls lever again]
Now then, cat don't wanna eat mice...
[types on machine, pulls lever again]
...but cat wants dog to massacre him.
[types on machine, pulls lever again, and looks at results]
It just don't add up!
[Dog then hears a dog pound driving by and runs to it, and runs away from Claude, Hubie and Bertie]
Hey, take baby!

[while running up to runaway Dog]
You forgot to massacre me!
[Hubie and Bertie run up to Claude Cat and the Dog, as the closing credits start]
Wait a minute, wait a minute. Now, uh, you're a cat, right?
Right.
And, uh, cats eat mice, right?
No!
You - he-he - you're mice, right?
Right.
And mice, they eat cheese, right?
Cheese? Ahh! Don't mention that word!
